result.arabic_text: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ
result.translation: Au watu wa mijini wameaminisha ya kuwa adhabu yetu haitawafika mchana, nao wanacheza?
result.footnotes: Je, watu hawa wameghafilika na wamejiaminisha kuwa adhabu haitawajia mchana kweupe na jua linawaka, nao wameshughulikia mambo yasiyo na faida nao?
